description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Schoharie county, and border wars of New-York; containing also a sketch of the causes which led to the American Revolution; and interesting memoranda of the Mohawk Valley; together with much other historical and miscellaneous matter, never before published" Author: SIMMS, Jeptha Root. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 1447.g.18." Page: 455 Place of Publishing: Albany Date of Publishing: 1845 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003388168 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
